American rifles the special force

American rifles the special force! Can you embrace the sniper competition and show your shooting power in this new 3D first-person sniper game.

DOWNLOAD the app for FREE now and don't miss amazing upgrade system for weapons and mission. If you like fighting and shooting games, you will love the American rifles the special force!

The best first person shooter action game 2017! Be the best professional shooter in every environment! Here, your duty will include kill the enemy and save the city and racing against time, exploding different cities, and quite a few bloody headshots in slow motion

Download American rifles the special force to enjoy super duper and unending 3D adventure of fps shooting crime simulator Game.

=> Real Crime city 3d environment
=> Easy to learn gameplay
